p: Of note, the antioxidant activity of microalgal carotenoids was reported to be significantly higher than that of plants or synthetic analogues. The in vitro antioxidant activity of fucoxanthin, a brown xanthophyll found in golden algae, was reported to be >13 times higher than α-tocopherol, vitamin E [ 175]. Similarly, astaxanthin, a red keto-carotenoid, was 65 times higher than vitamin C and 100 times more effective than α-tocopherol [ 97].
